config.random_respawn_on_death.title: Random Respawn on Death Config
config.random_respawn_on_death.range_hin: Enter a value between 100 and 10,000 blocks
advancement.random_respawn_on_death.root: Welcome to a world where death sends you somewhere unexpected!
advancement.random_respawn_on_death.firs: Collect your first death marker by returning to where you died. WARNING: In survival mode, this will activate temporary hardcore mode until you restore your health!
advancement.random_respawn_on_death.curs: Break the curse by eating your first golden apple
advancement.random_respawn_on_death.deat: Die multiple times and collect the experience
advancement.random_respawn_on_death.mast: Master death itself and prove your resilience
